content: sprung hat is a charted pattern in which you work 2 color strands of yarn at a time after making the ribbing on size 2 needles you switch to size 3 to complete the chart all yarns are from the knit picks palette line which is fingering weight 100% wool there are 9 colors in this patterns coriander heather mc 46 yds clover 20yds finnley heather 15 yds tarragon 15 yds cream 20 yds lichen 56 yds mai tai heather 15 yds orange 15 yds salsa heather 15 yds
